description: Try our easy to follow Rainbow Fruit Jelly Cups recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Rainbow Fruit Jelly Cups Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: While the first layer of jelly is setting, dissolve the remaining gelatine in boiling water as before. Repeat layers of fruit and jelly.
